morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow, Fresh Vibes
morningBrief.body: 4" of new snow. Not a powder day, but definitely an upgrade. 1 new trail opened today. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got a Touch-Up
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. 2 new trails opened today. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Overnight Refresh
morningBrief.body: Overnight dusting of 2" means the hardpack got a makeover. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: A Little Sugar on Top
morningBrief.body: A light refresh of 1" overnight makes the groomers smoother. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Snow showers in the forecast with a few inches expected. Conditions should improve.

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow, Fresh Vibes

morningBrief.headline: Rain at Base, Snow Up Top
